headline: Top Prosecutor Sues Her City For the Denial Of Civil Rights
abstract: Kimberly Gardner, the top prosecutor in St. Louis, who is under investigation herself, is accusing city officials of a “racially motivated conspiracy” to stop her from doing her job.
lead_paragraph: A battle between St. Louis’s first African-American top prosecutor and the city’s largely white legal establishment escalated this week, with the prosecutor suing her opponents under a little-used federal law passed in the wake of the Civil War to stem violence by the Ku Klux Klan.
